verbs.description: [ARG0: Marco Antonio Muñoz , a Honduran man ,] [V: killed] [ARG1: himself] [ARGM-LOC: in a Texas jail] [ARGM-TMP: after he was separating from his family at the U.S .- Mexico border under policies promulgated by President Trump and Attorney General Jeff Sessions] .

Marco Antonio Muñoz , a Honduran man , killed himself in a Texas jail after he [V: was] separating from his family at the U.S .- Mexico border under policies promulgated by President Trump and Attorney General Jeff Sessions .
